title: Kiffin's assistants in flux as Ole Miss advances
content: Shortly after Pete Golding and Ole Miss finished an upset of Georgia on Thursday, a source told ESPN's Mark Schlabach to expect some "fireworks," as LSU coach Lane Kiffin decides how many of his assistants can remain with the Rebels for the CFP semifinal.

title: Smart: UGA 4th-down faux pas 'on us as coaches'
content: After Georgia's 39-34 loss to Ole Miss in Thursday night's Sugar Bowl, Bulldogs coach Kirby Smart took responsibility for a failed a fourth-down play in the second half.

title: Golding, Rebels continue 'special' run, oust UGA
content: In his second game as Ole Miss' head coach, Pete Golding led the Rebels to a 39-34 win over Georgia in Thursday's Sugar Bowl in New Orleans, a back-and-forth College Football Playoff contest that sent his squad to the semifinal round.

title: DeBoer: 'Fine line' between Alabama, greatness
content: Alabama Crimson Tide coach Kalen DeBoer said there is "a fine line" between his team's historic 38-3 loss to Indiana in the College Football Playoff quarterfinal at the Rose Bowl and where it wants to be.

title: Sources: Aikman to advise Fins on GM search
content: The Dolphins have brought on Hall of Fame quarterback and ESPN analyst Troy Aikman as a consultant to advise the organization on its general manager search process, according to sources.

title: IU tops Tide in 'dream come true'; Ducks up next
content: Indiana quarterback Fernando Mendoza and the top-seeded Hoosiers won the Rose Bowl Thursday in convincing fashion, authoring a 38-3 victory over No. 9 Alabama to secure a berth in the College Football Playoff semifinals, where they will meet No. 5 Oregon.

title: Lamar: I'm playing, have never quit on Ravens
content: Lamar Jackson says he's expecting to play when the Ravens take on the Steelers in Pittsburgh for the AFC North title Sunday night.

title: Ducks' defense blanks Tech to reach CFP semis
content: Matayo Uiagalelei caused a fumble to set up a touchdown as the Ducks silenced Texas Tech 23-0 in the Orange Bowl to reach the College Football Playoff semifinals.

title: üèà Barnwell names his annual All-Pro team
content: Jaxon Smith-Njigba and Puka Nacua were clear WR picks, but the CB group was hard to sort out. Which 50 players made Bill Barnwell's list?

title: CFP semifinal first look: Previewing the penultimate round
content: How each team can win its semifinal game, plus key players and what we learned from the quarterfinals.

title: Our guide to every Week 18 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions and what's at stake
content: Must-win AFC North and NFC South showdowns? No. 1 seeds on the line? We have picks, predictions, stats and what's at stake for every Week 18 game.

title: Let's game plan for 10 teams that need Week 18 wins: One key to victory for each coaching staff
content: Ten teams are trying to secure playoff spots, division titles or top seeds, and we found one thing each of them must do in Week 18 to get it done.

title: College Football Playoff: What's next for Georgia, Alabama, Texas Tech and others?
content: As each team is ousted from the College Football Playoff, we look at its offseason storylines and personnel priorities.

title: Why the World Cup could delay some MLS-based USMNT stars' European dreams
content: The USMNT has several breakout stars in MLS who, in years past, would've jumped at a January move abroad. In 2026, though, they might have to sit tight.

title: Stories of Bills' Highmark Stadium tunnel ahead of final game: 'Ours is dumb'
content: The Bills' old tunnel will forever be a hallmark to those who experienced it -- and those players told us their stories.

title: 67 points and a 'transfer portal' surprise: Nonconference hoops superlatives
content: As conference play begins, we hand out superlatives for some of the best on- and off-court moments from nonconference play.

title: What does James Nnaji's eligibility mean -- now and for the future?
content: The former pro signed with Baylor midseason. How did it happen, and what does this mean for the sport?

title: LaLiga is back! Can Real Madrid beat leaders Bar√ßa to title?
content: Here's all you need to know about the 2025-26 LaLiga season so far before it resumes this weekend following the winter break in Spain.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Rodrygo lined up by Arsenal, Man City
content: Premier League sides Arsenal and Manchester City are potential destinations for Real Madrid's Rodrygo. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Don't expect Chelsea to hire an elite coach after Maresca split
content: Chelsea used to demand success, hiring the world's best coaches to deliver results. Enzo Maresca's departure reveals that that's no longer the case.

title: New year, same problems for Liverpool side lacking depth, dynamism
content: Devoid of last season's swagger, Liverpool's draw with Leeds showed how much work remains for Arne Slot.

title: The Playbook: Shadow Reports, lineup locks and projected scores for Week 18
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: Assembly passes 5 Bills, gives nod to reorganisation of GHMC
content: Minister Sridhar Babu says it will decentralise administration of areas within ORR, abutting it for planned development

title: A.P. Maritime Board gets nod to set up greenfield port, mega shipbuilding cluster at Dugarajapatnam
content: The government will form an SPV for the port and shipbuilding cluster project and steps are being taken to acquire 2,000 acres of land for it

title: Wife's interim maintenance cannot be determined with mathematical precision: Delhi HC
content: Justice Amit Mahajan has also said that "mere earning in foreign currency" does not entitle the wife to claim maintenance by "mechanically converting the husband's foreign income into Indian currency".

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: ACB to develop network of informants to check corruption in A.P.
content: The ACB officials booked 115 cases in 2025, in which 36 accused were convicted, says Director-General Atul Singh

title: Government‚Äôs claims on ‚Äòtrue down‚Äô charges misleading, says CPI(M)
content: An amount of nearly ‚Çπ24,000 crore has been imposed in various forms on power consumers in the last 18 months, alleges party leader Babu Rao

title: Opposition accuses Speaker Narwekar of interfering in nomination process for BMC polls
content: The allegations related to filing of nominations by candidates on December 30 at the Returning Officers' (RO) office in Colaba, which was handling forms from three wards, for the January 15 polls to the BMC.

title: BJP leader condemns ‚Äòattack‚Äô on Gali Janardhan Reddy in Karnataka
content: The incident is a blot on democracy and reflects the law and order situation under the Congress government in that State, says Vishnuvardhan Reddy

title: Sukhada hospital to be inaugurated in Hubballi on January 4
content: Sukhada Vascular Institute and Superspeciality Hospital, which primarily focuses on vascular diseases and diabetic foot disorders, will be inaugurated in Hubballi on January 4.

title: Chhattisgarh liquor 'scam': HC grants bail to former CM Bhupesh Baghel's son Chaitanya
content: The HC granted him bail in a case lodged by the ED and another by Chhattisgarh Anti Corruption Bureau/Economic Offence Wing, ED counsel Saurabh Kumar Pande told PTI

title: Mamdani's note for Khalid: India won't tolerate any interference in its internal matters, says BJP
content: If anybody comes out in support of any accused and interferes in India's internal matters, the country will not tolerate it, says BJP national spokesperson Gaurav Bhatia

title: Haryana's sex ratio rises to 923 in 2025, highest in five years
content: The State registered 5,19,691 births ‚Äì 2,70,281 males and 2,49,410 females ‚Äì as against 5,16,402 in 2024, including 2,46,048 females, according to the data

title: How language became a battleground in Assam
content: Study revisits 1961 Silchar violence to examine how policy, identity and power shaped linguistic conflict

title: Dense fog alert issued for 11 Jharkhand districts from January 3
content: The 'yellow' alert for dense fog has been issued for Garhwa, Palamu, Chatra, Hazaribag, Koderma, Giridih, Deoghar, Dumka, Godda, Sahibganj and Pakur from 8.30 a.m. on January 3 to 8.30 a.m. on January 5, 2026, according to an IMD bulletin

title: Indore water contamination: Infant born after 10-year wait dies; family rejects government compensation
content: A simple act of diluting packaged milk with water cost the baby his life and plunged the Sahu family into unbearable grief

title: Kashmir sees clear skies, dip in night temperatures; Gulmarg coldest at minus seven degrees Celsius
content: The region is currently going through 'Chilla-e-Kalan', a 40-day period of extreme cold; during this phase, night temperatures typically drop several degrees below the freezing point

title: CPI(M)‚Äôs bid to cling to power through horse-trading anti-democratic, says Sunny Joseph
content: KPCC president says evidence has emerged on how the CPI(M) ‚Äòbought off a UDF-backed Independent member to seize control of the Wadakkanchery block panchayat in Thrissur‚Äô

title: Youth held for posting Instagram reel showing explosion of country-made bomb
content: The reel was found to be deliberately provocative, created with the intention of disturbing public peace and hindering traffic movement in the area, the police said

title: KSEB to collect 7 paise per unit as fuel surcharge from bimonthly-billed consumers in January
content: Board will collect 8 paise from monthly-billed consumers. The surcharge is meant to recover ‚Çπ18.45 crore spent additionally on power purchases in November 2025 on account of the variations in the price of fuel used in power-generating units

title: Despite normal rainfall from northeast monsoon, Tamil Nadu almost touches paddy coverage target
content: Against the overall target of 33.9 lakh acres, the coverage is 33.8 lakh acres. This season, around 14.8 lakh tonnes of paddy was procured against the normal 5 lakh tonnes. About 38 lakh tonnes more is likely to be procured in the coming eight months

title: Mumbai‚Äôs mayor will be Hindu-Marathi: CM Fadnavis
content: The issue had snowballed after Mumbai BJP president Ameet Satam recently remarked that his party would not allow any ‚ÄúKhan‚Äù to become the city‚Äôs mayor

title: Chamundi Hill walk to raise alarm over ecological concerns
content: Members of various environmental and citizen groups and public to climb steps to highlight the urgency of saving the hill ecosystem from unchecked commercialisation

title: Pak Pushes Disinformation Again To Revive Debunked Claims On Op Sindoor
content: In what analysts describe as a renewed effort to rewrite the narrative of a past military episode, Pakistan has once again turned to social media to circulate misleading and unverified satellite imagery.

title: Opinion: Analysis: How Mamata Banerjee Is Banking On 'Bengali Hinduism' To Counter BJP
content: It is undeniable that Hindutva has been central to the BJPs politics. Mamata, like other Opposition leaders, is trying to counter this with her own brand of Hinduism. But Bengali Hinduism is distinctly different.

title: Canada Seeks Air India Response After Pilot Detained Over Liquor Smell
content: Canadian aviation authorities have asked Air India to take corrective steps and submit its response by January 26 after one of the airlines pilots was detained at Vancouver airport for allegedly being under the influence of alcohol

title: Pollution Curbs Under GRAP-3 Lifted In Delhi-NCR As Air Quality Improves
content: The Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) in NCR and Adjoining Areas on Friday revoked curbs imposed under GRAP 3 following improvement in air quality, officials said.

title: Saudi Airstrikes Hit UAE-Backed Separatists In Southern Yemen
content: Saudi warplanes have reportedly struck on Friday forces in southern Yemen backed by the United Arab Emirates, a separatist leader says. There were no immediate reports of casualties.

title: Himachal College Student Dies After Sexual Assault, Professor Among 4 Charged
content: Three female students and a professor have been charged with ragging and sexual assault after a second-year student died in a college in Himachal Pradesh's Dharamshala, the police said.

title: Ukraine Denies Targeted Strike On Kherson Hotel That Killed 27
content: The Ukrainian army said Friday it only hit "military targets", a day after Russia accused Kyiv of firing drones at a hotel and cafe in Ukraine's occupied south, killing 27.

title: In Video Before Death, Student Who Died After Sex Assault Recounts Horror
content: A heart-wrenching video of the 19-year-old student from Himachal Pradesh who died after being ragged and harassed has emerged, in which she speaks about repeated instances of sexual assault by a professor in her college.

title: Adani Enterprises Announces Third Rs 1,000 Crore NCD, Issue Opens Jan 6
content: Adani Enterprises Limited on Friday announced the launch of its third public issuance of secured, rated, listed, redeemable, non-convertible debentures (NCDs) of Rs 1,000 crore, offering up to 8.90 per cent per annum.

title: Kilos Of Gold, Silver, Cash Seized In Gujarat In Stock Market Scam Probe
content: Several kilograms of gold and silver and cash worth over Rs 4 crore were seized by the Enforcement Directorate on Friday from Gujarat's Mehsana district as part of a money laundering investigation linked to a major stock market investment fraud.

title: "Take Care Of Your Own Soldiers": Iran On Trump's 'Locked And Loaded' Threat
content: US President Donald Trump and top Iranian officials exchanged duelling threats Friday as widening economic protests swept across parts of the Islamic Republic, further escalating tensions between the countries.

title: 8 Journalists, YouTubers Sentenced To Life By Pakistan Anti-Terror Court
content: A Pakistani anti-terrorism court sentenced eight journalists and social media commentators on Friday to life imprisonment in absentia after convicting them of terrorism-related offences.

title: Japanese Man Strips Naked, Climbs Barrier During Emperor's New Year Greeting
content: Japan's emperor is generally treated with hushed reverence, but one man stripped away all decorum -- quite literally -- during a New Year's event on Friday, local media reported.

title: Indore Municipal Officials Removed After Water Contamination Deaths
content: The Madhya Pradesh government has initiated action against senior officials of the Indore Municipal Corporation following a deadly outbreak of waterborne illness linked to contaminated drinking water supply in parts of the city.

title: Adani Total Gas Cuts CNG, Piped Gas Prices In Big Relief To Customers
content: Adani Total Gas Ltd, the city gas joint venture of Adani Group and French giant TotalEnergies, has cut prices of CNG and natural gas piped to household kitchens for cooking across multiple markets, delivering direct relief to them and motorists.

title: 'Sin, Demands Repentance': BJP's Uma Bharti On Indore Water Tragedy
content: As deaths linked to contaminated drinking water continue to mount in Indore's Bhagirathpura area, the political sparring over the tragedy has intensified, cutting across party lines and exposing rare public dissent within the ruling BJP itself.

title: Probe Agency ED Arrests Key Accused In Rs 7-Crore "Digital Arrest" Scam
content: The Directorate of Enforcement (ED) on Wednesday arrested a key accused following search operations in connection with its money laundering probe into a high-value 'digital arrest' cyber fraud case involving industrialist SP Oswal.

title: Alarming Trend Of White-Collar Terrorism Emerging In India: Rajnath Singh
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh on Friday said that an alarming trend of white-collar terrorism is emerging in the country, wherein highly educated people are engaging in anti-social and anti-national activities.

title: 66 Flights Cancelled At Delhi Airport Due To Fog, Low Visibility
content: As many as 66 flights were cancelled at the Delhi airport on Friday due to fog and low visibility conditions.

title: "US Locked And Loaded": Trump Warns Iran Over Protest Crackdown
content: President Donald Trump said Friday that the United States is "locked and loaded" to respond if Iran kills protesters, after cost-of-living demonstrations in the country turned deadly.

title: College professor, three girl students booked for ragging, sexual harassment in Himachal
content: The girl died during treatment at a Ludhiana hospital on December 26 and the case was registered on January 1, 2026

title: Rajnath flags 'alarming trend' of educated people indulging in anti-national activities
content: ‚ÄúPerpetrators of the [Delhi] bomb blast were doctors ‚Äì those who write 'Rx' on prescriptions, yet have RDX in their hands. This highlights the need for knowledge to be accompanied by values and character,‚Äù says Defence Minister

title: Ministry of Home Affairs restores ‚Çπ100 crore project approval powers to Ladakh L-G
content: The order comes a month after the MHA had withdrawn the existing delegated powers of the Lieutenant Governor of Ladakh to approve schemes and projects up to ‚Çπ100 crore

title: Nellore Collector celebrates New Year at orphanage
content: Himanshu Shukla plans to give books and other educational kits to the students studying in all welfare hostels in the district soon

title: Modi govt could give neither clean water, nor clean air, making public suffer: Kharge
content: Narendra Modi ji, who never gets tired of trumpeting the Jal Jeevan Mission and Swachh Bharat Abhiyan, is maintaining his usual silence on the deaths caused by drinking contaminated water in Indore, says Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge

title: Civic polls: Maharashtra SEC to check if pressure, allurement, coercion used for unopposed election
content: The poll body will check if any pressure was applied, allurement was given or any coercive means used against opponents to withdraw their nominations for unopposed election, officials said

title: Major fire guts footwear factory in Kerala‚Äôs Malappuram
content: Fire and Rescue Services personnel suspect that an electrical short circuit may have triggered the blaze

title: Grow at home, engage abroad: External Affairs Minister Jaishankar tells students at IIT Madras event
content: The Union Minister was speaking at Chennai during the launch of IITM Global Research Foundation, as part of which IIT Madras has signed a series of memoranda of understanding with leading multinational institutions and partners across key global regions.

title: TMC to be in Opposition after West Bengal Assembly polls: Suvendu Adhikari
content: BJP speaks of giving to Bengal industries like in Gujarat and good governance like that in Uttar Pradesh and Bihar, says BJP leader Suvendu Adhikari

title: SIR in 12 States/UTs: Enumeration form collection ‚Äòmuch less‚Äô in urban areas
content: In rural areas, the enumeration form collection by booth-level officials was much higher as compared to urban areas

title: Nainar Nagenthran slams DMK govt. over delay in procurement of sugarcane, raw rice for Pongal gift hamper
content: In a post on X, Mr. Nagenthran said that with just 13 days left for the Pongal festival, the DMK government had only now issued a government order allocating ‚Çπ248 crore for the Pongal gift hamper

title: Collective efforts needed to protect youth from drug abuse: Himachal Governor Shiv Pratap Shukla
content: Governor Shiv Pratap Shukla stresses that awareness and collective resolve are key to safeguarding the younger generation from drug abuse

title: Civic polls: Ashok Chavan faces cash-for-ticket allegations; ex-CM rejects charge
content: ‚ÄúBy giving tickets in exchange for money, the party has sacrificed its loyal workers,‚Äù says Bhanusing Rawat

title: Must prevent entry of drugs, communal politics into Tamil Nadu: CM Stalin
content: ‚ÄúDivisive forces were engaged in depicting the people of the country as enemies of each other. Instead of using spiritualism to foster love, some groups were using it to foment trouble,‚Äù Mr. Stalin said while flagging off the 11-day Samathuva (communal harmony) padayatra of MDMK general secretary Vaiko in Tiruchi.

title: Delhi Assembly plans to scare monkeys away with langurs, mimicry
content: ‚ÄúThere are dozens of monkeys near and around the location who create trouble, jumping on wires and dish antennas and breaking them,‚Äù says officials

title: Ballari clash: Sriramulu seeks High Court or CBI probe into firing that killed youth
content: Alleging that private gunmen associated with Satish Reddy had opened fire during the chaos, Mr. Sriramulu added that a bullet of .76 mm calibre had been recovered.

title: Indore water tragedy: PM Modi stays silent whenever poor die, says Rahul Gandhi
content: Leader of Opposition in Lok Sabha alleged that Madhya Pradesh has become the epicentre of misgovernance and cited various instances of casualties reportedly due to cough syrups, poor hygiene at government hospitals and now due to contaminated water

title: Konaseema Collector R. Mahesh Kumar's kayak overturns in canal, he escapes unhurt
content: The official was kayaking in the irrigation canal during the inspection-cum trial-run in the run up to the three-day national-level water sports competitions to be organsed at Pulidindi village

title: Farmers raise concern over illegal water drawal from Bhavanisagar Dam
content: They complained that a few farmers have reportedly been drawing several lakh litres of water every day from the Bhavanisagar Dam by installing two 3 HP motors in the water spread area

title: BJP corporator's son slaps sub-inspector in U.P.‚Äôs Varanasi, beaten up by people
content: According to DCP Gaurav Banswal, a case has been registered against the corporator's son, Himanshu Srivastava, in connection with the incident, and he is being sent to jail

title: 'Dhurandhar' declared tax-free in Ladakh by Lieutenant Governor
content: "Film spotlights Ladakh‚Äôs cinematic landscapes, signalling strong support for filmmakers and reinforcing the UT‚Äôs push to emerge as a preferred destination for film shoots and tourism," says Lt. Governor of Ladakh Kavinder Gupta

title: Polls to 12 ZPs, 125 panchayat samitis likely in first week of February; schedule expected next week
content: On January 6, the SEC will hold a meeting of the officials from the districts that are expected to go to polls in the third phase

title: RS MP Priyanka Chaturvedi flags ‚Äògross misuse‚Äô of AI on social media, writes to IT Minister Vaishnaw
content: She raises concerns over the alleged misuse of artificial intelligence (AI) tools on social media platforms, especially Grok on X, to post objectionable images of women using fake accounts

title: Ghaziabad Police orders inquiry after video shows officer intimidating residents with ‚Äòdevice to detect nationality‚Äô
content: The incident occurred during what police called as a ‚Äúroutine area domination exercise‚Äù; Opposition Congress demanded the judiciary to take suo moto cognizance on the video and initiate action on the police officer

title: DJ alleges police misconduct during New Year celebrations in Kerala‚Äôs Pathanamthitta
content: The incident reportedly occurred late at night after the event ran past its scheduled time, prompting police intervention

title: Vellappally Natesan says CPI created impression of lack of unity in LDF, loses cool at media again
content: SNDP Yogam general secretary questions the way in which CPI raised its criticism of LDF government‚Äôs decision to sign up for PM-SHRI scheme

title: Chhattisgarh mine stir: Video shows woman constable‚Äôs clothes being torn; two held
content: ‚ÄúTwo men have been arrested in connection with the incident so far, and efforts are being made to identify others involved in the crime,‚Äù police said

title: Telangana CM speaks on flak against him on social media; says Musi project is to boost Hyderabad‚Äôs image
content: Revanth Reddy says Govt is committed to providing maximum compensation to the families affected by Musi Rejuvenation project

title: Camp to be held in Thane district on January 18 to distribute 300 prosthetic limbs
content: ‚ÄúThe camp will be held by the Bharat Vikas Parishad in collaboration with the Divyang Kendra, Pune. The Kendra, which has been operational for 25 years, has already provided artificial limbs to 25,000 persons,‚Äù says an official

title: Indore water contamination: What we know so far
content: At least 10 people have died and over 2,800 fallen ill after consuming contaminated drinking water in Indore, triggering NHRC‚Äôs suo motu intervention and raising questions over sanitation lapses in India‚Äôs cleanest city.

title: KCR must come to Assembly to dispel propaganda against him on water projects, says Kavitha
content: Telangana Jagruthi president says she will launch of an independent political party and contest in next Assembly Elections

title: Sri Lankan Navy arrests 11 Karaikal fishermen
content: The Navy personnel reportedly surrounded their mechanised fishing vessel in the early hours of Friday near Mullaitheevu

title: Satheesan accuses Kerala CM of using Vellappally Natesan as ‚Äòmouthpiece‚Äô to create communal divide
content: V.D. Satheesan accuses Pinarayi Vijayan of trying to create communal hatred ‚Äòsimilar to such efforts made by Sangh Parivar‚Äô and says CM had miserably failed in earlier attempts to pander to minority and majority communalism

title: J&K Police orders probe after cricketer wears helmet with Palestinian flag in Jammu tournament
content: Photos of Furqan Ul Haq were circulated online after he was seen displaying the flag on his helmet during the Jammu and Kashmir Champions League

title: DPR for Musi Rejuvenation project Phase-I to be ready in few days: Telangana CM Revanth
content: Clarity on scope of works by Sankranti and estimates to be prepared before the fiscal end, says the Chief Minister

title: Ballari clash: BJP alleges ‚Äògoondaism‚Äô, seeks judicial probe
content: BJP leader B.Y. Vijayendra claimed that a large number of Congress workers and supporters had taken to the streets holding swords, machetes and sticks, creating fear and disorder in Ballari.

title: 200 parrots die of food poisoning in MP's Khargone district
content: Teams from the veterinary and forest departments, as well as the wildlife wing, have been monitoring the area for the past four days after being alerted by residents

title: Air pollution off the charts in Hyderabad on first day of 2026; average AQI of 339
content: The lowest AQI recorded on January 1 was 230, categorised as ‚Äòpoor‚Äô and equivalent of smoking 20-30 cigarettes per day

title: Canada asks Air India to probe incident of pilot reporting for duty under influence of alcohol, source says
content: In a statement, ‚ÄãAir India confirmed the flight ‚Å†from Vancouver to Delhi on December 23 experienced a last-minute delay due to the incident, adding that an alternate pilot was brought in to operate the flight

title: I am seriously considering to report: Javed Akhtar slams his AI-generated video
content: "A fake video is in circulation showing my fake computer-generated picture with a topi on my head, claiming that ultimately I have turned to God . It is rubbish," says Javed Akhtar

title: Jana Sena Party requests ECI to initiate SIR in Andhra Pradesh
content: They expressed confidence that SIR would make the electoral rolls comprehensive, inclusive, and free from errors

title: Delhi HC finds prima facie evidence of violation of Pawan Kalyan‚Äôs personality rights
content: The Judge stated some of the defendants were using Mr. Kalyan‚Äôs name, likeness, voice, and image for selling merchandise for commercial gains either directly or through e-commerce platforms

title: Ashwini Vaishnaw virtually witnesses final bullet train tunnel breakthrough in Maharashtra‚Äôs Palghar
content: The 508-km Mumbai-Ahmedabad High Speed Rail project is India's only high-speed rail project designed to operate bullet trains at a speed of 320 kmph, covering the entire distance in 2 hours and 17 minutes

title: Ballari clash: Case booked against Janardhan Reddy, 10 others in banner row; heavy security deployed
content: The complainant alleged that banners put up along Siruguppa Road near the Avvambhavi residence of Gangavathi MLA Gali Janardhan Reddy were forcibly removed, leading to a confrontation

title: Indore water contamination: Mayor says informed of 10 deaths
content: Local residents have claimed that 14 individuals, including a six-month-old infant, have died due to the health crisis. The health department has not confirmed this claim

title: Kerala rings in New Year on a high with record liquor sales of ‚Çπ125.64 crore
content: Among Bevco outlets, Kadavanthra outlet in Kochi topped the list with sales of ‚Çπ1.17 crore on New Year‚Äôs Eve

title: Murder of retired IAF personnel in Ghaziabad orchestrated by sons: Police
content: ‚ÄúYogesh had been trying to get his house vacated by his sons, following which they allegedly plotted his murder out of greed for the property,‚Äù says police

title: Civic polls: Denied ticket, Shiv Sena leader stages protest march in Thane
content: Former Thane deputy mayor and Shiv Sena leader Rajendra Sapte, who was keen on contesting from ward number 25 (Kalwa), lost the chance after it went to the BJP as part of a seat-sharing deal

title: 'Bloodthirsty mob': Kin of Hindu man set on fire in B'desh in shock; seeks justice
content: A Bangladeshi businessman, Khokon Chandra Das, was brutally attacked and set on fire by a mob. He sustained severe burn injuries and is undergoing treatment. His family expressed shock and confusion over the senseless attack. The incident occurred near Keurbhanga Bazar. Police are investigating the matter. This assault follows other violent incidents targeting the Hindu community in Bangladesh.

title: Sparklers & champagne: New photos show moment blaze erupted in Swiss bar
content: Photos have emerged showing lit sparklers attached to bottles inside a packed nightclub in the Swiss ski resort of Crans-Montana at the moment a deadly fire broke out during New Year‚Äôs Eve celebrations. The blaze at Le Constellation killed at least 40 people and injured more than 100, with videos showing panic as exits were blocked by the spreading fire.

title: No Tests farewell: 'Rohit, Kohli & Ashwin deserved that respect' - BCCI faces scrutiny
content: Former England spinner Monty Panesar has criticised the BCCI for failing to organise farewell Test matches for Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, and Ravichandran Ashwin. He said the trio deserved greater respect for their contributions and compared India‚Äôs approach with England, where legends like Stuart Broad and James Anderson received memorable farewells.

title: 'Unable to speak': Faridabad gang rape survivor battles fractures; kids ‚Äòterrified‚Äô
content: A 25-year-old Faridabad woman, severely injured and traumatized after being raped and assaulted, is unable to give her statement to police. She sustained multiple facial fractures and requires surgery. Two drivers have been arrested in connection with the brutal incident.

title: 'The end of me': Google's Eric Schmidt on AI; says 55 years of coding wiped out
content: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt believes AI's rapid advancement, already handling 10-20% of programming tasks, signals the end of traditional coding careers. He sees AI's true economic power in automating corporate functions like billing and accounting, not just coding. Schmidt also predicts Artificial General Intelligence by 2029, urging human oversight to preserve agency.

title: T20 WC: No Rickelton and Stubbs! South Africa announces squad
content: South Africa named their T20 World Cup squad with new faces Kwena Maphaka and Jason Smith, while dropping Ryan Rickelton and Tristan Stubbs. Smith earned selection due to strong recent form. Kagiso Rabada and Anrich Nortje return to the side. Placed in Group D, South Africa begin their campaign against Canada on February 9 in Ahmedabad.

title: 'A red line': Iran hits back after Trump's 'loaded' warning; mocks US 'rescue record'
content: Iran issued a stern warning against US intervention, vowing retaliation after President Trump pledged aid to protesters. The exchange escalates tensions amid ongoing demonstrations over economic hardship, with Iranian officials accusing the US and Israel of fueling unrest and threatening regional destabilization.

title: Tesla's former AI boss: Google Waymo cannot match Tesla's self-driving tech
content: Former Tesla AI chief Andrej Karpathy believes Google's Waymo couldn't replicate Tesla's recent coast-to-coast autonomous drive. He highlighted Tesla's end-to-end neural network versus Waymo's modular system, which struggled during a San Francisco power outage. Karpathy praised the milestone despite recent criticism from Elon Musk about his "dated" views.

title: 'No thanks': Ex-Pak coach rejects idea of replacing Gambhir as India coach
content: Former Pakistan coach Jason Gillespie dismissed suggestions of replacing Gautam Gambhir as India coach with a blunt ‚ÄúNo thanks.‚Äù Under pressure after poor results, Gambhir‚Äôs role sparked fan debate online. Gillespie, who quit Pakistan‚Äôs coaching job after seven months in 2024, is believed to be cautious about high-pressure roles, despite remaining a respected red-ball coach.

title: Indore water row: 10 dead; reports flag 'presence of bacteria' - key findings
content: A severe diarrhoea outbreak has struck Bhagirathpura in Indore, Madhya Pradesh. Contaminated drinking water has caused at least 10 deaths and sickened over 1,400 residents. Officials identified a leakage in the main water pipeline near a police outpost, leading to sewage contamination. Residents are now fearful of the water supply, even from tankers.

title: 7 killed in Saudi airstrikes: Separatists targeted in Yemen; ties with UAE sour
content: Saudi-led coalition airstrikes hit camps of UAE-backed southern separatists in eastern Yemen. At least seven people died and over 20 were injured. This escalation follows rising tensions between Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates. Saudi Arabia claims the separatists received weapons from the UAE. The situation remains tense as separatists refuse to withdraw from their positions.

title: Million-dollar pay: Sam Altman offering highest-ever salaries; $1.5m average stock pay
content: OpenAI, led by Sam Altman, is reportedly outpaying Meta's Mark Zuckerberg in employee compensation.  The AI firm is offering an average of $1.5 million in stock-based pay, significantly exceeding historical tech startup figures. This aggressive strategy aims to retain top AI talent amidst fierce competition, even as Meta has also made substantial offers to lure researchers.

title: Delhi High Court spots clear violation of Pawan Kalyan's personality rights
content: Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan won Delhi HC protection for his personality rights against Flipkart, Amazon, Meesho, Google, Meta, and others misusing his image, voice for sales and AI. Court bans unauthorized use; next hearings Feb 9 & May 12, 2026. Affected parties can seek relief.

title: OTD, 147 years ago: Spofforth claimed the first hat-trick in Test history
content: On January 2, 147 years ago, Fred Spofforth etched his name in cricket history by claiming the first-ever Test hat-trick at the Melbourne Cricket Ground. This remarkable feat, achieved in just his second Test, propelled Australia to a dominant 10-wicket victory over England. Spofforth's bowling prowess was instrumental throughout the match.

title: Sophie Cunningham vs Napheesa Collier net worth: WNBA earnings and endorsements
content: WNBA stars Sophie Cunningham and Napheesa Collier have a long-standing friendly rivalry dating back to high school. They have both achieved significant success in their professional careers. While Cunningham boasts a net worth of $2 million, Collier's is estimated at $1.5 million, with both athletes leveraging endorsements and off-court ventures to boost their earnings.

title: Fans hail Ayesha Curry‚Äôs 'A+ wife move' as gesture for Stephen Curry goes viral
content: Ayesha Curry recently garnered widespread praise from fans for wearing her husband Stephen Curry's Davidson jersey during a visit to his alma mater. This heartwarming gesture, seen during a tribute to the NBA star, effectively silenced recent marriage rumors. Fans lauded her unwavering support and loyalty, highlighting the couple's strong bond.

title: Caitlin Clark & Connor McCaffery 2025 net worth: Earnings & endorsements
content: Caitlin Clark and Connor McCaffery, a power couple in the sports world, boast a combined net worth of $11.5 million. Clark, a WNBA star, has secured lucrative endorsements alongside her rookie contract. McCaffery, a rising basketball coach, is building his career after playing multiple sports in college. Their individual successes contribute to their impressive financial standing.

title: NHL trade rumours: Canucks linked to Sherwood, Pettersson; Bruins eye Maccelli
content: NHL trade buzz is intensifying as the Vancouver Canucks reportedly explore deals involving Kiefer Sherwood and Elias Pettersson. Meanwhile, the Boston Bruins are rumored to be eyeing Matias Maccelli to bolster their offense. With the March 6 trade deadline looming, these potential moves are capturing significant league attention, hinting at imminent roster changes for both franchises.

title: 'India has right to defend': Jaishankar hits out at 'bad neighbours' ‚Äî what he said on neighbourhood policy
content: External affairs minister S Jaishankar stated India faces challenges from "bad neighbours," implicitly referencing Pakistan, and asserted the nation's right to self-defense against persistent terrorism. He emphasized India's strategic autonomy, dismissing external mediation and highlighting that continued hostility undermines goodwill, impacting pacts like the Indus Waters Treaty.

title: 'New York vich munda renda‚Äô: Babbulicious performs at Mamdani's oath ceremony - Watch
content: New York City's first Muslim Mayor, Zohran Mamdani, made history with a vibrant subway oath ceremony featuring a viral Punjabi music performance.  Mamdani, known for his outreach to the South Asian diaspora, danced with his wife to a popular track, captivating attendees and sparking widespread social media excitement. This event underscores his commitment to celebrating diverse cultural roots.

title: Kashmir landslide: Massive rocks crash onto NH-1 near Baramulla; motorists run for cover
content: A massive landslide on the Srinagar‚ÄìBaramulla‚ÄìUri highway disrupted traffic on Friday morning. The incident occurred on the Baramulla stretch of NH-1 amidst severe cold wave conditions and snowfall in higher reaches. The region is currently experiencing Chilla-e-Kalan, a period of intense winter.

title: 'Ikkis' vs 'TMMTMTTM': Agastya‚Äôs war drama nears Rs 10cr; 'Dhurandhar' continues to dominate
content: Bollywood's 2026 begins with the war drama 'Ikkis,' marking Agastya Nanda's debut and Dharmendra's final performance. Despite a slow start, 'Ikkis' is outperforming Kartik Aaryan's 'Tu Meri Main Tera Tu Meri,' with 'Dhurandhar' continuing its strong run in its fifth week.

title: Between belief and balance: The quiet rise of Australia U-19 all-rounder John James
content: Australia U-19 all-rounder John James‚Äô rise is rooted in belie. Shaped by family sacrifice, influential coaches and an old-school batting philosophy, James blends adaptability with mental clarity. With Bengal and Kerala roots his love for football is a no secret, a sport, he played till he turned 16. He wants to succeed as a leader and seeks inspiration from none other than Pat Cummins. The teenager is gearing up for U-19 World Cup, starting January 15.

title: 'Locked & loaded': Trump issues stark warning to Iran as protests rage; vows to ‚Äòrescue‚Äô protesters
content: Former US President Donald Trump has issued a stern warning to Iran, vowing American intervention if peaceful protesters are violently suppressed.  This comes as widespread demonstrations, fueled by economic hardship and soaring inflation, grip the nation.  Protesters are voicing strong dissent against the government, with chants targeting top leadership, marking the most significant unrest since 2022.

title: From controversial Nazi wave gesture to Punjabi groove: Viral moments from Mamdani‚Äôs oath ceremony
content: Zohran Mamdani made history as New York City's first South Asian and Muslim mayor, sworn in at a subway station. His inauguration sparked viral moments, including a debated hand gesture, a heartfelt tribute to his "Kampala to Delhi" roots, and a lively Punjabi music performance that captured the city's multicultural spirit.

title: 'He bats like his father': Yograj asks Sachin's son Arjun to focus on batting
content: Former India cricketer Yograj Singh says Arjun Tendulkar is a natural batter, but coaches wrongly focus only on his bowling. He revealed Arjun himself felt his batting was ignored and praised his strokeplay, comparing it to Sachin Tendulkar. Despite modest stats, Arjun has shown promise and is now opening for Goa in domestic cricket.

title: Brittany Mahomes shares New Year glimpse as Patrick Mahomes grinds through rehab
content: Patrick Mahomes is entering 2026 focused entirely on rehab after suffering ACL and LCL tears late in the season. A New Year post from Brittany Mahomes confirmed he is still on crutches, reinforcing the long road ahead. Andy Reid stressed patience, noting Mahomes remains around the team while prioritizing recovery over travel or timelines.

title: Selection preview: Shreyas racing against time for NZ ODIs; Will Shami get India recall?
content: India‚Äôs selectors face key decisions ahead of the New Zealand ODI series, with Shreyas Iyer racing to regain fitness, uncertainty surrounding Rishabh Pant‚Äôs spot, and Mohammed Shami pushing for a comeback. With workload management and long-term planning in mind, the squad selection could shape India‚Äôs white-ball roadmap ahead of the T20 World Cup.

title: 'Epicentre of misgovernance': Rahul slams MP govt on Indore water issue; takes 'Kumbhakarna' dig
content: Rahul Gandhi accused the Madhya Pradesh government of distributing "poison" after 10 deaths in Indore due to contaminated water. He criticized the "double-engine government's" negligence, stating clean water is a right, not a favor, and blamed the administration for the tragedy.

title: Candace Owens sparks buzz with viral video referencing Charlie and Erika Kirk
content: Candace Owens shared a fast paced video filled with pop culture and political memes, featuring references to Stranger Things, Justin Bieber, Sean ‚ÄúDiddy‚Äù Combs, and Charlie and Erika Kirk. The montage blended celebrity controversy with internet humor, fueling speculation about her teased 2026 return and reinforcing her strategy of using viral content to drive attention and online debate.

title: Why did Trump ban Epstein from Mar-a-Lago? Former employees reveal details ‚Äî Report
content: Jeffrey Epstein was barred from Donald Trump‚Äôs Mar-a-Lago Club in 2003 after an 18-year-old beautician complained he had pressured her for sex. Former staff told The Wall Street Journal that Epstein was sexually suggestive during appointments, and Ghislaine Maxwell used the spa to recruit young workers for unauthorised jobs. Trump agreed to sever ties, describing Epstein as a ‚Äúcreep.‚Äù

title: 'Completely humiliated': Gillespie on coaching Pakistan ‚Äî reveals details of chaotic exit
content: Jason Gillespie felt "completely humiliated" during his nine-month tenure as Pakistan's Test coach.  He resigned after the PCB sacked senior assistant Tim Nielsen without consultation, a decision that blindsided him.  Gillespie also revealed feeling marginalized, questioning the board's commitment to his role. A financial dispute over unpaid dues is ongoing.

title: ‚ÄòNo way out‚Äô: Telangana student dies in Germany after jumping from burning apartment on New Year‚Äôs Eve
content: A 22-year-old Telangana engineering student, Thokala Hruthik Reddy, tragically died in Germany after jumping from his burning apartment on New Year's Eve. Trapped by a fire in Brandenburg, he suffered fatal head injuries. His family is now appealing for assistance to bring his body back to India.

title: Quote of the day by Mark Twain: 'A man can never be comfortable in life without...'
content: Mark Twain is one of the greatest American writers that lived on Earth. He is known across the world not just for his books, but for his sharp humour and witty one liners.  He sw the world through the lense of humour and expressed the most serious sermons on life in the most lively way. In this article we talk his most profound quotes, which holds a deep meaning.

title: Woman cop attacked during Raigarh protest: On-duty Constable dragged, stripped and filmed; two held
content: Two men were arrested in Raigarh, Chhattisgarh, for allegedly stripping an on-duty woman constable during an anti-mining protest. A viral video showed the constable pleading for mercy as her uniform was torn. The incident, linked to an agitation against a coal block, saw villagers blocking roads and confronting police. Another video reportedly showed a female Town Inspector being kicked.

title: Gold price today: How much the yellow metal costs in your city? Check rates
content: Gold and silver futures saw a strong start to the year on Friday. Investors sought safe-haven assets amid expectations of lower US interest rates. Global trends supported the rise in precious metal prices. Gold and silver prices climbed significantly on the Multi Commodity Exchange. International markets also reported gains for both metals.

title: Elon Musk‚Äôs father Errol warns US could be doomed if whites become minority
content: Errol Musk sparked controversy with remarks on US demographic change, warning of severe consequences as the white population declines. He drew parallels to South Africa, denying apartheid's oppression. These comments, widely condemned, intersect with political tensions and echo discredited racial theories, placing Musk at the center of a debate on demographics and identity.

title: China to deploy military in Balochistan? Mir Yar Baloch flags ‚Äòserious threat‚Äô to EAM
content: Baloch leader Mir Yar Baloch has warned of potential Chinese military deployment in Pakistan's Balochistan region due to deepening China-Pakistan ties and the CPEC project. He expressed concern over decades of repression in Balochistan and urged India to bolster Baloch resistance forces. Baloch representatives view the escalating strategic alliance as dangerous, potentially threatening both Bharat and Balochistan's futures.

title: 'Dhurandhar' marches toward Rs 750 cr in 2026, while 'Tu Meri Main Tera..' crawls towards Rs 32 cr
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' continues its impressive run, nearing Rs 750 crore on its 29th day with Rs 740.78 crore collected. In contrast, Kartik Aaryan's 'Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri' struggles, reaching just over Rs 30 crore after nine days of release.

title: Palestine flag at Jammu cricket match: Police launch probe ‚Äî player, organiser questioned
content: Jammu and Kashmir Police are investigating a Palestinian flag displayed on a cricketer's helmet during a local match. A player and tournament organiser have been summoned for questioning as authorities examine the circumstances and intent behind the flag's appearance. The privately organised league is not recognised by the state cricket association.

title: Swiss ski resort tragedy: Video shows moment New Year‚Äôs fire broke out - what caused the blaze
content: A devastating fire at a crowded New Year's party in Crans-Montana, Switzerland, claimed at least 40 lives and injured over 100. The blaze, believed to have started in the basement venue with a single staircase exit, caused widespread panic as patrons struggled to escape. Investigations are underway to determine the cause and examine safety compliance.

title: CBSE's reminder for class 10 and 12 practical exams 2026: Guidelines explained
content: CBSE has issued an important reminder for all schools regarding Class 10 and 12 practical exams for the 2026 board exams. Practical exams, projects, and internal assessments are scheduled from January 1 to February 14, 2026. Schools must upload marks on the same day of the exam. All arrangements for labs and examiners must be in place.

title: Unified Friday Prayer Timing: UAE slot nationwide; schools, traffic adapt today
content: The UAE has unified Friday prayer timings to 12:45 PM across all emirates starting January 2, 2026, simplifying schedules for families and workers. This change, part of the 'Year of the Family' initiative, aims to synchronize community events. Expect increased traffic due to school dismissals and concentrated mosque-goers, with public transport frequencies boosted. Weather remains fair with mild temperatures.

title: VHT: 'He's street-smart' ‚Äî Sarfaraz on Musheer as brothers turn campaign into a showreel
content: Mumbai's Sarfaraz and Musheer Khan are electrifying the domestic cricket scene with their combined skill and swagger. The brothers have been instrumental in Mumbai's four consecutive wins in the Vijay Hazare Trophy, showcasing their individual strengths and mutual understanding on the field. Sarfaraz's explosive batting and Musheer's all-round contributions are keeping the 'Khan show' unmissable.

title: Bullet train milestone: First mountain tunnel breakthrough achieved in Maharashtra's Palghar
content: India's bullet train project achieved a significant milestone with the breakthrough of a 1.5-km mountain tunnel in Palghar, Maharashtra. This marks the first mountain tunnel completion on the Mumbai-Ahmedabad corridor. With this, the stretch between Thane and Ahmedabad is now clear, leaving only the Mumbai-Thane undersea section as a constraint. The first bullet train is anticipated by August 15, 2027.

title: 'Border 2': Varun drops new pics with teaser of 'Ghar kab aaoge' song
content: Varun Dhawan shared new pictures from the song 'Ghar Kab Aaoge' for the upcoming war drama 'Border 2'. Composer Anu Malik has clarified that he has received proper credit for the song's recreation. The film, featuring Sunny Deol and Diljit Dosanjh, is slated for a January 23, 2026 release.

content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. title: Soccer's closest rivals? PSG play host to new next-door neighbors Paris FC
content: uber-trendy Paris FC moved into the Stade Jean-Bouin on the doorstep of the Parc des Princes . the move was well-timed, as that same summer the club won promotion to the top flight from Ligue 2 . it means that the two clubs are stationed across the street from each other .

title: Claressa Shields, Gabriela Fundora, Amanda Serrano and more
content: women's boxing continued its rapid growth in 2025 . new faces have emerged, while several fighters have fallen out altogether . the year featured historic milestones, including multiple undisputed champions . a thrilling conclusion to the Katie Taylor-Amanda Serrano trilogy and Claressa Shields unifying all four heavyweight titles .

title: FCS national championship preview: Illinois State, Montana State starving for title
content: NDSU came within 37 seconds of a national title in 2014 . the Bobcats came up three points short of the title . they're the first team to win four road games in a single playoff run . it's their first title game since the 2014 heartbreath of FCS .

title: CFP quarterfinal takeaways: Ole Miss' wild upset, Indiana's dominance and more
content: the second edition of the college football playoff quarterfinals gave us two classics and two statement wins . on Wednesday, no. 10 Miami rode an early 14-0 burst and a clutch late touchdown drive to a 24-14 upset of no. 2 Ohio State . the Hurricanes advanced to the semis to face no. 6 Ole Miss .

title: NFL playoff schedule, projected bracket: Here's what to know in both conferences
content: the playoffs will begin Saturday, Jan. 10 with the first two wild-card round games . there are two open spots (one in each conference), uncertainty for both the AFC and NFC 1-seeds and a few division titles out there for the taking . we won't know the complete playoff bracket until late Sunday night .

title: An advanced analytics look at Panthers-Bucs, Seahawks-49ers, Ravens-Steelers
content: the AFC North is down to the Baltimore Ravens (8-8) and the Pittsburgh Steelers (9-7) in a win-or-go-home matchup . the 49ers would have a three-way tie at 8-9, but the Panthers would hold the tiebreaker .

title: College football transfer portal: Tracking who's on the move
content: College football's transfer portal officially opened at midnight ET on Jan. 2. However, players have been announcing their intentions to transfer since the regular season ended. Players now have until Jan. 16 to enter their name to transfer. It doesn't mean they have to find their new schools by then -- or that they can't return to their previous schools. We are tracking the notable players entering the portal as well as those players who will re-sign with their current schools. Here's the latest news and updates on how the 2026 season could be transformed.

title: NHL's holiday on ice amid balmy Miami's swaying palm trees
content: the team submitted a proposal to host the NHL's annual winter hockey event in the tropics . the proposal was based on a play on the hit 1980s television show "Miami Vice" the league awarded tv's "miami Ice" to the team .

title: Ranking the best players in the college football transfer portal
content: the offseason transfer portal window for college football players opens at midnight ET on Jan. 2 . there's no spring transfer period this year, so teams have one big chance to get their rosters right for 2026 . here are ESPN's rankings of the top players in the portal .

title: Bold MLB predictions for 2026: The World Series champion Orioles? A Skubal blockbuster?
content: we asked our experts to give their boldest predictions for what the new year will bring . a look into the crystal ball for the topics that will have us all talking in 2026 . the Baltimore Orioles finished last in the AL East in 2025, but their 75 wins were the most .

title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, each team's most intriguing January game
content: this week's Power Rankings identifies a key game during the month of January for each team . a panel of ESPN hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . previous ranking refers to the previous edition, published Dec. 19 .
